name: Haftoo.com
overview:
“Life happens on Haftoo…”

Haftoo has developed a social platform that changes the way users interact and consume shared content. Our goals were to add value to social interactions and provide people with a content driven experience that will enable them to easily broadcast and consume what they choose. Haftoo offers a totally unique experience driven by • Privacy • Customization • and Communication With Haftoo you can easily • Interact with other users • Design pages to fit your needs • and follow the types of content you choose Best of all, Haftoo enables you to create additional page types to fit the various aspects of your life. The platform integrates seamlessly with your current social networks and offers levels of privacy and real-time customization not available within other existing social sites. We appreciate the opportunity to introduce our ideas and our vision to the world! Haftoo is well beyond the Alpha phase and very close to launch but we need your help to make it a reality. Now is the time for a platform that speaks to the next generation of creative social users and entrepreneurs. We think Haftoo is that network. Join us. Believe in innovation. Contribute to Haftoo.com.

Features include:

  • Seamless integration with existing social sites.
  • Real-time distribution of content and posts
  • Detailed page customization
  • Multiple privacy options for pages and content
  • Search people or content
  • Ability to create groups
  • Custom URLs
  • Site analytics
  • Connect RSS feeds
  • 50% revenue sharing from your page
  • 100% Free to use
  • No gimmicks No hype

We appreciate your support in bringing social networking to the next level. Thank you!
